remarks: One ball is contained in another if the center-to-center distance is less than the difference of the radii.  In this version of ~ blss2 for extended metrics, we have to assume the balls are a finite distance apart, or else ` P ` will not even be in the infinity ball around ` Q ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)
